name: topublicinfrastructure*WordsfortheMetaverse_4
description: To public infrastructure · Words for the Metaverse by @theoverview_ · #4: Vinton Cerf: 'We had no idea that this would turn into a global and public infrastructure.' + Satoshi Nakamoto: 'It is a global distributed database, with additions to the database by consent of the majority.' + Cypherpunk Manifesto (1993): 'Cypherpunks write code.' + Martin Luther: 'Pray like it all depends on God, then when you are done, go work like it all depends on you.'
